title: Imperatives
description: Give basic instructions and commands: 'Sit down!', 'Be quiet.'

subtopics.title: Giving Instructions
subtopics.description: Use the base form of the verb to tell someone what to do.

examples.sample: Turn left at the corner and walk two blocks.

subtopics.title: Negative Imperatives
subtopics.description: Use 'don't' before the verb to tell someone not to do something.

examples.explanation: Command telling someone to stop running.

exercises.expected: Don't run on the wet floor.
